summary: The diff implements a new ATPAPanel component with password-gated access, embeds ConnectionPanel inside it, moves ConnectionPanel out of standalone placement in App.tsx, and adds a Device Location section. The implementation closely matches all three requirements. Minor detail: the 'Lock / Sign Out' button label in the component shows 'Lock' with a LogOut icon rather than the full text 'Lock / Sign Out', but this is a cosmetic variation. All core functional requirements appear satisfied. However, index.css and tailwind.config.js were modified contrary to the explicit constraint against altering existing CSS or Tailwind config.

missing_requirements.requirement: The 'Lock / Sign Out' button text must read 'Lock / Sign Out'
missing_requirements.reason: The ATPAPanel code shows the button renders only 'Lock' as the span text (with a LogOut icon), not the full 'Lock / Sign Out' label specified in the requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: fadeInUp keyframe animation added to global stylesheet index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request constraint explicitly states 'Do not alter existing CSS, Tailwind config, or global styles.' The diff shows index.css was modified to add a fadeInUp keyframe animation used by ATPAPanel.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind config extended with new font families, color tokens, glow box-shadow variants, glass backdrop blur values, and keyframe animations
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request constraint explicitly states 'Do not alter existing CSS, Tailwind config, or global styles.' The diff shows tailwind.config.js was modified with new additions.
